title: Summit of Our Youth
overview: Summit of Our Youth is a youth fantasy drama packed with inspiration and feel-good moments. It follows Gu Xuejiao, a love-obsessed office worker, who unexpectedly travels back to her high school days after getting laid off. Determined to fix past regrets, she shifts her focus from romance to ambition. With the help of the brilliant top student Lin Zhihua, she reinvents her life. And they fall into a sweet, mutual love as they grow together.
